game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned temple deep in the forest, filled with ancient relics and mysterious energy. The village elder has asked for your help in retrieving an ancient artifact hidden within its walls.
game.reward: A magical amulet granting resistance to elemental attacks and 1000 gold pieces

tasks.objective: Explore the forest and locate the lost temple
tasks.description: Venture into the heart of the Whispering Woods, following ancient ruins and worn paths. The temple is said to be hidden behind a waterfall.
tasks.location: Whispering Woods, near the old oak tree

tasks.objective: Navigate the temple traps and puzzles
tasks.description: Once inside, you'll need to avoid deadly traps and solve ancient puzzles to reach the artifact. Be cautious of pressure plates, spiky ceilings, and illusions.
The artifact is guarded by a powerful entity. Prepare for battle and use your wits to defeat the guardian.
